testcase.name: orawls::urandomfix RedHat on operatingsystem RedHat should contain Exec[set urandom /etc/sysconfig/rngd] with user => "root"
orawls::urandomfix RedHat on operatingsystem RedHat should contain Service[start rngd service] with ensure => true and enable => true
orawls::urandomfix RedHat on operatingsystem RedHat should contain Exec[chkconfig rngd] with user => "root" and command => "chkconfig --add rngd"
